title: How AHS: Apocalypse Should Have Ended
author: Think Story
comment: Don't get me wrong, I love you AHS! 💖
It was a lame ending. Satan would of never allowed his son to be ran over by a Range Rover.

Thing that stuck out for me is that I felt sorry for Michael Langdon.  He was basically used his entire life, and then run down like a chipmunk in the road.  Even his father, Satan, just says "meh" and moves on to another vessel to reset the game.  Satan's been playing too many video games, so I thought this ending disappointing as well.
Can we talk about how those two teenagers (don’t even remember their names) added nothing to the story and died for nothing
"The stew is Stew" always kills me
description:
I was a little less than excited about how American Horror Story's 8th season, "Apocalypse" ended. So I put this video together explaining some of my frustrations and offer an alternate ending.

Jump to my alternate ending:
